fields.name: SpecialHandle
fields.label: Special Handle?
fields.help: The definition of "Special Handle" is pre-agreed between customer and TD SYNNEX. This is usually for "Configuration" or "Production Value Ad" request.

fields.name: BackOrderWarehouse
fields.label: Back Order Warehouse
fields.help:
"PO" means fill BO from selected or "best" for PO.
"FIRST" (default) means fill BO from first available warehouse.

fields.name: ShipFromWarehouse
fields.label: Ship from Warehouse
fields.help: Ships entire PO from selected warehouse number.

fields.name: ShipFromWarehouse
fields.label: Ship from Warehouse
fields.help: Ships entire PO from selected warehouse number.

fields.name: SpecialPriceReferenceNumber
fields.label: Vendor Promotion Reference Number
fields.help: Applicable only when `Special Price Type` is set to "Vendor Promotion".

fields.name: ShipComment
fields.label: Ship Comment
fields.help:
Ship Comments to be printed in Shipping document (Packing Memo).

Any comments that are entered will force the transaction into your TD SYNNEX Sales Rep’s sales queue forsales review, and manual order release.

fields.name: ShipCommentInternal
fields.label: Ship Comment (Internal)
fields.help:
Shipping instructions to be read ONLY by TD SYNNEX internal warehouse staff, not to be printed in shipping document nor packing memo for end-customer to read.

Any comments that are entered will force the transaction into your TD SYNNEX Sales Rep’s sales queue forsales review, and manual order release.

fields.name: Shipment.ShipMethod.Code
fields.label: Ship-Method Code
fields.help: Not ALL carriers are available in your delivery area. Please check with your TD SYNNEX sales rep if you are unsure which carrier is available for you to use as a resource. Please contact Catalyst to limit the displayed list of ship-method codes.

options.text: ON TIME TRUCKING DNJ LTL ONLY
UPS Mail Innov Flats less 1 lb

fields.name: Shipment.ShipMethod.Code
fields.label: Ship-Method Code
fields.help: Not ALL carriers are available in your delivery area. Please check with your TD SYNNEX sales rep if you are unsure which carrier is available for you to use as a resource. Please contact Catalyst to limit the displayed list of ship-method codes.

fields.name: Shipment.FreightAccountNumber
fields.label: 3rd-Party Freight AC#
fields.help: Account to be billed by carrier (e.g. FEDEX). If not specified then freight is charged to the party pre-agreed by TD SYNNEX sales and customers.

fields.name: Payment.BillTo.SynnexLocationNumber
fields.label: Synnex Location Number
fields.help: Customers with multiple bill-to locations may use this field to indicate the Location Number (CPOP.BillToLocation.SYNNLoc#) to be used.

fields.label: - This section is required when placing a Software License PO.

fields.name: SoftWareLicense.AuthorizationNumber
fields.label: Authorization Number
fields.help: Authorization Number given by Software Vendors.

fields.label: - This section is required for Software License PO - or - when the PO is billed directly to the end user.
- This section is required when the PO is billed directly to the end user.

fields.name: EndUser.SynnexAccountNumber
fields.label: Synnex Account Number
fields.help: If this tag is not populated/provided and this PO is meant to be billed to this end user, then TD SYNNEX will assume this end user does not have account# yet and will create an account automatically.

fields.name: EndUser.EndUserType
fields.label: End User Type
fields.help:
If this tag is not populated, then we assume this end user is a non-Government/Educational End User.
Values: F- Federal Government, L- State Government or Local Government, E- Education.

fields.name: EndUser.EndUserShipExpense
fields.label: End User Ship Expense
fields.help: End-User Shipping & Handling Expense per Reseller, ONLY for End-User Bill to PO/orders!

fields.name: EndUser.ContractCode
fields.label: Contract Code
fields.help: The Contract Code between end user and reseller.

fields.name: EndUser.ContractFeeCode
fields.label: Contract Fee Code
fields.help: The Contract <u>Fee Code</u> between end user and reseller.

fields.name: EndUser.ContractFee
fields.label: Contract Fee
fields.help: The Contract <u>Fee</u> between end user and reseller.

fields.name: EndUser.ContractDeliveryDate
fields.label: Contract Delivery Date
fields.help: The Contract Delivery Date agreed between end user and reseller.
